H0.text: Which King of England had two wives, both named Isabella. Edward II

H1.text: Which King of England had two wives, both named Isabella. Richard II

H2.text: Which King of England had two wives, both named Isabella. Henry IV

H3.text: Which King of England had two wives, both named Isabella. John

A4.text: Isabella was Queen of England from 1200 to 1216 as the second wife of King John

A5.text: Isabella of France was Queen of England as the wife of King Edward II

A6.text: By the Spring of 1200, John had been granted permission to have his marriage to Isabella annulled on the grounds of consanguinity.
